contents:
更新：现场照片

via Twitter Ezra Cheung  @ezracheungtoto

#LIVE: Withstanding chilly wind, more than 700 are determined to line up here for at least five hours to join a new labour union for Hong Kong medical personnel. 37-year-old nurse Jan Tsang tells me that despite the dangerous virus, the #WuhanOutbreak consolidates Hong Kongers.

The newly found labour union, Hospital Authority Employees Alliance, has sprouted after the monthslong #antiELAB movement. 35-year-old Winnie Tsui says the previous labour union, which is under pro-Beijing political party Hong Kong Federation of Trade Unions cannot represnet her.
